intro: Psychotria hamata, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to Central and South America. The plant typically grows as an erect shrub, reaching heights of up to 2 meters, with opposite, elliptical leaves that are often glossy. Its flowers are fragrant and attract various pollinators, including bees and butterflies. Psychotria hamata is also noted for its ornamental value in tropical gardens due to its vibrant color and unique appearance.
